meanings.sent1: She brushed her teeth twice a day.
meanings.sent2: He checked his watch twice during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed twice for more food.
meanings.sent4: The bell rang twice, signaling the end of the game.
meanings.sent5: The teacher reminded the students to read each question twice before answering.

meanings.sent1: I have only been to that restaurant twice.
meanings.sent2: She wore her favorite dress twice last week.
meanings.sent3: The dog barked twice at the mailman.
meanings.sent4: The old clock chimed twice before stopping.
meanings.sent5: He apologized twice for forgetting her birthday.
